dict.acceptation: 总是，老是；永远，始终；常常；不断地；

sent.orig: The Sony's always-on autofocus chip means that you can refocus while you're shooting video.
sent.trans: Sony的不间断自动对焦芯片(always-onautofocuschip)可以使你在录像的时候重新对焦。

sent.orig: If you always do what you've always done, you always get what you've always got.
sent.trans: 如果你的行动总是一成不变，你得到的结果也总是一成不变。

sent.orig: It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres.
sent.trans: 她永远保护、信任、希望和百折不回。

sent.orig: Why always indecisive why always hesitant not ex-why always at mark time at first.
sent.trans: 为什么总是优柔寡断为什么总是犹豫不前为什么总是在原地踏步。

sent.orig: She understood, as she always did. Always had. Always would.
sent.trans: 她能理解，一如既往，今后也如此。
